page.title: 20WHY ANOTHER SURVEY?
page.content: During the course of this project we have been able to explore in some detail the villages and surrounding countryside in which we live,much of which we take for granted.A study of this kind helps us to appreciate how lucky we are to live in such a pleasant rural environment. We wish to thank everyone who has contributed material and taken time off from their work to talk to us. Special thanks must be given to the staff of the Royal Ordinance Factory for the tour of their facility. {**** RESEARCHERS **** { THANKS ALSO TO THE FOLLOWING PUPILS {FOR THEIR EFFORTS./Claire Salter,Sarah {Wright,Deborah Palfrey,Matthew {Douglas,Jenny Zobel,Hannah Coles,Tina {Camp,Alison Baker,Stuart Cooke,Ellie {Phipps,Joanne Davis,Karen Dyer,Nicola {Pilbrow and the Puriton W.I.
